description: Australian mutant siblings Heather and Davis Cameron were sent to live in Surfer's Paradise by their father in an effort to spare them from his life as Viceroy, godfather of Australian organized crime.
name: Slipstream
powers: Reality warping capabilities that enables him to conjure a "warp wave"
A quantum portal that connects any two locations on earth
Can take other people through the warp wave through increased concentration to maintain the wave
Navigated with the use of a shortened metal surfboard
Use of a shortened metal surfboard
